name: Penguin Skip
description: Help the penguin adventure by playing this game on an adventure that will be even more exciting.  And be prepared to jump fast before the ice will melt and fall into the cold sea of ice.  Collect as many fish as you can to go to the shop to exchange for protective suits and increase your edge with the brave penguins in this game.  Come on, prove your dexterity and show it with friends for fun play
